    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DBHelper getInstance(Context context)
        Singleton - This method ensures that there exists only one DBeHelper instance at any time. Creates a helper object to create, open, and/or manage a database.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase db)
        Create database. Called when the database is created for the first time. This is where the creation of tables and the initial population of the tables should happen.
        Specified by:
        onCreate in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - The database.

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db,
             int oldVersion,
             int newVersion)
        Upgrade database. Called when the database has to be upgraded. Where we can drop, alter tables or do anything else it needs to upgrade to the new schema version.
        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - The database.
        oldVersion - The old database version.
        newVersion - The new database version.
